mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, HASHTAG, WDATE, SHOPNAME, ADDRESS, READCNT, PICTURE FROM EATAEWONBBS WHERE (SHOPNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%') OR ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, HASHTAG, WDATE, SHOPNAME, ADDRESS, READCNT, LIKECNT, SHOPURL, SHOPPHNUM, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, NICKNAME, PICTURE FROM EATAEWONBBS
SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, HASHTAG, WDATE, SHOPNAME, ADDRESS, READCNT, LIKECNT, SHOPURL, SHOPPHNUM, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, NICKNAME, PICTURE FROM EATAEWONBBS ORDER BY READCNT DESC

SELECT a.SEQ, a.ID, a.TITLE, a.CONTENT, a.HASHTAG, a.WDATE, a.SHOPNAME, a.ADDRESS, a.READCNT, a.LIKECNT, a.SHOPURL, a.SHOPPHNUM, a.LATITUDE, a.LONGITUDE, a.NICKNAME, a.PICTURE, b.PROFILPIC, b.PROFILMSG FROM EATAEWONBBS a, EATAEWONMEMBER b WHERE a.ID = b.ID ORDER BY a.WDATE DESC
SELECT SEQ, nickname, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, HASHTAG, WDATE, SHOPNAME, ADDRESS, READCNT, LIKECNT, PICTURE FROM EATAEWONBBS

SELECT bbsseq.nextval FROM DUAL
